TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit NetCodeGroup extends System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup
Public NotInheritable Class NetCodeGroup Inherits CodeGroup
public ref class NetCodeGroup sealed : System::Security::Policy::CodeGroup

summary.span: 向从其下载程序集的站点授予 Web 权限。

span.span: Grants Web permission to the site from which the assembly was downloaded.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码组是构建基块的代码访问安全性策略。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每个策略级别包含可以有一个或多个子代码组的根代码组。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have one or more child code groups. 每个子代码组可以具有其自己的子代码组;此行为将扩展到任意数量的级别，从而形成一个树。Each child code group can have its own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每个代码组有成员条件，它确定给定的程序集所属的组中，基于该程序集的证据。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to the group, based on the evidence for that assembly. 只有代码组的成员身份条件与匹配给定的程序集，以及它们的子代码组，将应用代码访问安全性策略。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly, along with their child code groups, apply code access security policy. 合并语义相同; 程序集的并集形成对象的所有匹配的子代码组和它生成从输入证据。 has the same merge semantics as that of ; it forms the union of the objects of all matching child code groups and the it generates from the input evidence. 但是，包含动态计算的权限返回授予连接到从中运行该代码; 该站点的访问权限只是返回一个静态的权限集。However, returns a permission containing a dynamically calculated that grants connect access to the site from which the code is run; simply returns a static permission set. 当是创建的它包含下表中所示的默认连接访问规则。When a is created, it contains the default connection access rules shown in the following table. |URI 方案URI Scheme|规则Rule| |----------------|----------| |文件file|无法连接到源服务器访问。No connection access to the origin server is permitted.| |httphttp|使用源服务器端口允许 HTTP 和 HTTPS 访问。HTTP and HTTPS access is permitted using the origin port.| |httpshttps|使用源服务器端口允许 HTTPS 访问。HTTPS access is permitted using the origin port.| 您可以控制的方案和允许代码通过将传递回其源站点的连接时要使用的端口使用相应的对象并属性值复制到方法。You can control the scheme and port that code is permitted to use when connecting back to its site of origin by passing a object with the appropriate and property values to the method. 可以创建应用时的原始方案证据中不存在或无法识别指定的连接访问规则("") 作为方案。You can create a connection access rule that applies when the origin scheme is not present in the evidence or is not recognized by specifying ("") as the scheme. 此外可以创建应用时没有连接访问规则具有匹配的方案通过指定的连接访问规则("\*") 作为方案。You can also create a connection access rule that applies when there is no connection access rule with a matching scheme by specifying ("\*") as the scheme. > [!NOTE] > 如果代码未提交的 URI 方案作为证据，回复到源站点使用任何一种方案允许访问。If code does not submit the URI scheme as evidence, access is permitted using any scheme back to the origin site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建并添加下载使用 HTTP 方案的代码的对象。The following code example demonstrates creating a and adding objects for code downloaded using the HTTP scheme. [!code-cpp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/cpp/sample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/CS/sample.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly AbsentOriginScheme As String

summary.span: 包含一个值，该值用于为具有未知或未能识别的原始方案的代码指定连接访问权限。

span.span: Contains a value used to specify connection access for code with an unknown or unrecognized origin scheme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时方法中，指定方案和关联对象。When calling the method, you specify a scheme and an associated object. 任何对象添加到使用作为来源时代码的原始方案中不存在其证据，或者不识别的方案应用方案对象。Any objects that you add to the using as the origin scheme are applied when the code's origin scheme is not present in its evidence, or is not a scheme recognized by the object. 若要指定对象使用的代码的原始方案中不匹配的原始方案添加到当前组中包含的方案时对象，请使用值。To specify the objects to use when the code's origin scheme does not match any of the schemes contained in the set of origin schemes added to the current object, use the value. 值字段为空字符串 ("")。The value of the field is an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddConnectAccess (string originScheme, System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess connectAccess);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddConnectAccess(string originScheme, class System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess connectAccess) cil managed

param.name: originScheme
param.span: 一个 ，包含要与代码的方案进行匹配的方案。

span.span: A containing the scheme to match against the code's scheme.

param.name: connectAccess

span.span: A that specifies the scheme and port code can use to connect back to its origin server.

summary.span: 将指定的连接访问权限添加到当前代码组。

span.span: Adds the specified connection access to the current code group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以添加多个对象的相同`origin scheme`。You can add multiple objects for the same `origin scheme`. 如果`origin scheme`已有一个或多个关联对象，指定`null`为`connectAccess`不起作用。If an `origin scheme` already has one or more associated objects, specifying `null` for `connectAccess` has no effect. 如果没有关联的原始方案对象，指定`null`有关`connectAccess`阻止使用与匹配的原始方案的代码`originScheme`访问其源服务器。If the origin scheme does not have associated objects, specifying `null` for `connectAccess` prevents code with an origin scheme that matches `originScheme` from accessing its origin server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和添加对象添加到。The following code example demonstrates creating and adding objects to a . [!code-cpp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/cpp/sample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/CS/sample.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly AnyOtherOriginScheme As String

summary.span: 包含一个值，用于指定任何其他未指定的原始方案。

span.span: Contains a value used to specify any other unspecified origin scheme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时方法中，指定方案和关联对象。When calling the method, you specify a scheme and an associated object. 可以使用的值字段来指定对象，应该用于未显式包含的原始方案添加到当前组的任何方案对象。You can use the value of the field to specify the objects that should be used for any scheme that is not explicitly contained in the set of origin schemes added to the current object. 用指定的对象如果代码的原始方案不匹配任何添加到当前的原始方案集中包含的方案，则仅使用字段对象。The objects specified with the field are only used if the code's origin scheme does not match any of the schemes contained in the set of origin schemes added to the current object. 若要指定对象在代码的原始方案在其证据中不可用或无法识别时应用使用值。To specify the objects to apply when the code's origin scheme is not available in its evidence or is not recognized, use the value. 值字段是"\*"。The value of the field is "\*".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetConnectAccess() cil managed

summary.span: 移除当前代码组的所有连接访问权限信息。

span.span: Removes all connection access information for the current code group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于删除系统提供的默认连接访问规则。Use this method to remove the system-supplied default connection access rules. 下表中显示的默认规则。The default rules are shown in the following table. |方案Scheme|规则Rule| |------------|----------| |文件file|无法连接到源服务器访问。No connection access to the origin server is permitted.| |httphttp|使用源服务器端口允许 HTTP 和 HTTPS 访问。HTTP and HTTPS access is permitted using the origin port.| |httpshttps|使用源服务器端口允许 HTTPS 访问。HTTPS access is permitted using the origin port.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法删除默认的代码访问连接规则。The following code example demonstrates calling this method to remove the default code access connection rules. [!code-cpp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/cpp/sample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/CS/sample.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The for the assembly.

summary.span: 对一组证据解析代码组及其子代的策略。

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: 由具有可选特性的代码组授予的权限组成的 ；或者，如果代码组不适用（成员条件与指定的证据不匹配），则为 。

span.span: A that consists of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将给定的加载程序集的证据，通过先检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件评估代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的代码组，其中包括评估的子代码组的策略语句。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 此方法的操作是按如下所示：The operation of this method is as follows: 如果成员资格条件与指定的证据不匹配，则返回`null`; 否则为设置要返回 (P) 的权限集等于代码组的策略语句并继续。If the membership condition does not match the specified evidence, return `null`; otherwise, set the permission set to be returned (P) equal to the code group's policy statement and continue. 对于每个子代码组，解析代码组具有相同的证据;如果结果不为`null`，返回该策略语句。For each child code group, resolve the code group with the same evidence; if the result is not `null`, return that policy statement. 如果没有子代码组匹配，则返回 P （父级的策略语句）。If no child code group matched, return P (the parent's policy statement).

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 将不止一个代码组（包括父代码组和任何子代码组）标记为 。

span.span: More than one code group (including the parent code group and any child code groups) is marked .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.
Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: 证据匹配的完整代码组集。

span.span: The complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将给定的加载程序集的证据，通过先检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件评估代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的根代码组。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 返回的代码组可能包含子代码组，这反过来，可能还有子代码组，因此返回值反映了所提供的证据匹配的代码组的完整集合。The code group that is returned may contain child code groups, which, in turn, may also have child code groups, so the return value reflects the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided.

span.span: The parameter is .
